room_title: Escape room "Kidnapped in the Warehouse" by Michigan Escape Room in Detroit
review: It's a blast every time! Even if we can't escape! We can't wait to back and try the other rooms! Highly recommend Kidnapped and the Elevator!

room_title: Escape room "Kidnapped in the Warehouse" by Michigan Escape Room in Detroit
review: We have now done 2 escape rooms here (Saloon and Kidnapped) and we loved them both! Our group has tried many different places and Michigan Escape Rooms is our favorite place. We can tell they go the extra mile to make sure the clues are like nothing you have seen before in any other room. Very unique atmosphere and just enough challenge. Definitely plan on going back for the Elevator room next!

room_title: Escape room "Kidnapped in the Warehouse" by Michigan Escape Room in Detroit
review: We did Kidnapped in the Warehouse and it was a lot of fun! We successfully escaped! All the different clues and details put in this room is amazing. We have done two other room in the past, but this one is by far our favorite from Michigan Escape Room!
